title: [Melgorehn's Reach, Overlook]
description: This small clearing reveals a view overlooking the moonlit reflections from Lake Eonak far below.  A few steps away, a narrow set of stairs lead up toward an imposing grey tower.  A broad path is barely visible at the end of the clearing.

This small clearing reveals a spectacular view of Lake Eonak and Wehnimer's Landing far below.  A few steps away, a narrow set of stairs lead up toward an imposing grey tower.  A large mountain blocks the sunlight and casts darkness along a broad path pushing down into a grassy valley.
